Package splot.services.extensions.fundp.handlers

Class Summary
CreateFeatureModelViewsHandler  
DeleteViewAllocationHandler DeleteViewAllocationHandler is used to delete the relation between a task and a view from the view's related file.
ImportWorkflowSpecificationHandler ImportWorkflowSpecificationHandler receives the workflow specification in an XML data and saves it in a folder containing the files of the workflow specifications.
LoadViewAllocationInformationHandler LoadViewAllocationInformationHandler is used to load the views associated to a special feature model and workflow.
ParseWorkflowSpecificationHandler LoadViewAllocationInformationHandler is used to parse the workflow specification imported folder, validate specification and save it to parsed folder.
ResponseViewDetailsHandler ResponseViewDetailsHandler is used to response the detail information of a special view.
ResponseWorkflowAndFeatureListHandler ResponseWorkflowAndFeatureListHandler is used to response a list of the workflows and the tasks .
SaveViewAllocationToRepository SaveViewAllocationToRepository is used to save the relation between a workflow, task and feature model.
SaveViewSpecificationToRepositoryHandler SaveViewSpecificationToRepositoryHandler is used to create a file for a view and save it in the views folder.
ShowWorkflowListHandler ShowWorkflowListHandler shows the selected workflow specification's information and tasks list to the user.
ValidateXPathHandler ValidateXPathHandler is used to validate the XPath expression.
ViewAllocationEditorHandler ViewAllocationEditorHandler is used to manage the view allocation editor.
ViewSpecificationEditorHandler ViewSpecificationEditorHandler is used to manage the view specification editor.
